Name: Meter
Description: The base unit of length in the International System of Units (SI).

Name: Kilometer
Description: A unit of length equal to 1,000 meters.

Name: Centimeter
Description: A unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter.

Name: Kilogram
Description: The base unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI).

Name: Bandwidth
Description: Measures data transfer capacity, typically used to quantify the speed of data flow in a network or service.

Name: Certificate renewal
Description: Represents the renewal of security certificates in cloud services for continued authentication and secure communication.

Name: Connection
Description: Measures the number of network or service connections established between users or applications.

Name: CPU Cores
Description: Represents the number of CPU cores allocated for processing tasks in a virtual machine or computing instance.

Name: Day
Description: A day of 24 hours.

Name: Gateway
Description: Represents usage or deployment of gateways, which manage traffic between different networks or devices.

Name: Hour
Description: Hour

Name: IO - Delete
Description: Tracks the number of delete operations performed on files, data entries, or other resources in a system.

Name: IO - Filesystem
Description: Represents input/output operations related to filesystem activities, such as file creation, access, or modification.

Name: IO - Indexing
Description: Tracks the number of indexing operations, such as creating or updating search indexes for faster data retrieval.

Name: IO - Inventory
Description: Represents the number of inventory-related I/O operations, such as listing files or resources in a storage system.

Name: IO - Operations
Description: Measures input/output operations across various system components, tracking performance or usage intensity.

Name: IO - Reads
Description: Tracks read operations, measuring the number of times data is accessed or retrieved from storage or databases.

Name: IO - Rename
Description: Represents operations involving the renaming of files, directories, or other entities in a system.

Name: IO - Retrieve
Description: Tracks the retrieval of data, files, or other resources in the system during input/output operations.

Name: IO - Storage
Description: Represents the number of storage-related input/output operations, such as saving or managing data in cloud storage.

Name: IO - Writes
Description: Tracks write operations, measuring how frequently data is written or saved to storage systems.

Name: Key - Renewals
Description: Represents the renewal of encryption keys or authentication tokens, ensuring secure communication and data protection.

Name: Memory
Description: Measures the allocation or usage of memory resources, typically in virtual machines or cloud services.

Name: Month
Description: Month of 30 days

Name: Operation
Description: Represents a generic count of system or service operations, tracking actions or activities performed in the environment.

Name: Request
Description: Tracks the number of service requests, including API calls, resource provisioning, or user queries.

Name: Second
Description: Second

Name: Secret-Renew
Description: Tracks the renewal of stored secrets, such as passwords, API keys, or other sensitive credentials.

Name: Test-Run
Description: Represents the execution of test runs, often used to track testing activities in a development or cloud environment.

Name: Throughput
Description: Measures the volume of data or tasks processed over a network or system in a given period.

Name: Base Unit
Description: Represents a generic base unit of measurement used in various Azure services or resources.

Name: Extra unit
Description: Represents an additional unit of measurement, typically for tracking extra resource consumption or usage.

Name: Workspace units
Description: Tracks the usage of workspace-related resources in a cloud or virtual environment.

Name: Workspace hours
Description: Represents the number of hours workspace resources are utilized within a cloud or virtual service.

Name: Base unit hour
Description: Measures the time in hours that a base unit resource is actively used or provisioned.

Name: Gateway Hour
Description: Tracks the hours a gateway is in use, managing network traffic or routing within cloud services.

Name: Extra unit hour
Description: Represents additional hours of resource usage, typically for tracking overage or extended service periods.
